item.title: Notes on Finance
item.description: General Principles Net Present Value (NPV) Interest Rates Internal Rate of Return (IRR) Tax (Opportunity) Cost of Capital Time Travel for Money Arbitrage Law of One Price Efficient Markets Hypothesis Cash Flow Stream Perpetuity Annuity Decision Rules NPV Rule IRR Rule Payback Rule Bond Bond Price Zero-Coupon Bond Coupon Bond Stock Dividend-Discount Model Total Payout Model Discounted FCF (Free Cash Flow) Model CAPM (Capital Asset Pricing Model) CAPM Assumptions Risk and Return Risk Measurement and \(Î²\) Portfolio Combined Portfolio Capital Structure Perfect Capital Market Assumptions Finance A Firm Leverage and Risk Debt and Tax Interest Tax Shield Personal Tax Financial Distress Trade-Off Theory Stock Payout Dividend Share Repurchase Tax and Dividend Options Put-Call Parity Early Exercise (American) Binomial Option Pricing Model textbook: Corporate Finance
